subtitle: A simple and delicious combination of peppers, tomatoes and black olives tossed in olve oil, oregano and garlic dressing, served on garlic toasts.

method.text: Mix together the peppers, onions, tomatoes and black olives and crushed garlic in a bowl. Stir in the oil, oregano and seasoning.
Toast the bread slices lightly on both sides. Rub the garlic halves over the toasts while still hot. The more you rub, the  more pungent the toasts will be.
Place toasts on a serving plate. Spoon over the pepper mixture and serve.

title: Pepper and olive bruschetta
